comment.author: 48335158@N00
comment._content: Is this the row that now holds Theatre of Wine and the Greenwich Kebab Shop?

comment.author: 32439675@N04
comment._content: The alley on the right is Dunford Street - the little street that goes up to the market from Greenwich Church Street. Going from right to left that would make the shops today: Beachcomber restaurant,  Fonehouse,  Cutty Sark restaurant, Newsagents, Clothes shop.
